quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: So when they didn’t act on my suicide disclosure, that’s neglect of duty.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: Yes, it should have triggered safeguarding protocol immediately.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: But it didn’t, so I was left at risk again.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I know, Ben, and I’m sorry you were left in that position.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Sorry doesn’t undo the risk. It proves they don’t follow their own laws.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: You’re right, it shows a serious failing.

contradictions.issue: Suicide disclosure should have triggered safeguarding but did not; advocate concedes serious failing

timeline_hooks.link: Failure to follow safeguarding law Apr–May 2025
